info.name: Roll20, Token Macro Bar, colorize
info.description: Modifies: Token Macro Bar. Changes the colors of the 1st 4 buttons.
info.additionalInfo: You can easily extend this to color more buttons and choose your own colors. It colors buttons based on the position, not the function, so whatever button is 1st will be purple. If you add a button in front of that, then the new button will be purple.
